commitResults.messageTitle: Update Score, Exam and ExamScores objects
commitResults.messageBody:

to adhere to coding standard
- add abstract method getScore()
- add relevant tests to ScoreTest

Exam:

getMessageScoreConstraints()
to make its intended usage clearer

ExamScores:
- make variable arrayOfScores private to
maintain immutability
- add getArrayOfScores() method
- make constructor method public and added
Javadoc comment

commitResults.messageTitle: Update TypicalPersons to include attendance and exam scores
commitResults.messageBody:
The current Persons in TypicalPersons used for
testing do not have any attendance and exam score
 data, only using the default values of zero
 attendance and unrecorded exam scores.

 This makes for poor testing as we are unable to
 test how the program may affect these variables.

 Update 4 Persons with typical values for
 attendance and exam scores to better reflect
 real world use cases.
 Add default versions of these 4 Persons with
 default values for attendance and exam scores
 and update tests related to AddCommand and
 EditCommand to use the default versions instead.

 The reason it is necessary to use default
 versions for these tests is that AddCommand and
 EditCommand are unable to affect attendance and
 exam scores. AddCommandTest will attempt to add
 a person with recorded attendance and exam
 score data while EditCommandTest will attempt
 to edit a person to reflect another person's
 exam scores and attendance, both of which are
 impossible. Therefore, versions of Persons with
 default values for these fields are used for
 these tests instead.

**Full change list**

TypicalPersons:
- add Attendance and ExamScores for ALICE,BENSON,
AMY and BOB
- add default versions of said persons without
attendance or exam scores
- add getDefaultTypicalPersons and
getDefaultAddressBook which only contains
default persons

LogicalManagerTest and AddCommandParserTest:
- update tests involving the Add command to use
default versions of persons and AddressBooks

EditCommandTest:
- update editedPerson in
execute_allFieldsSpecifiedUnfilteredList_success
such that the "expected" and "actual" edited
person has the same attendance and exam scores
(which cannot be changed by the edit command)

ScoreTest and TypicalExamScores:
- minor name changes for clarity and adherence to
coding standard

Update typicalPersonsAddressBook.json to reflect
changes to attendance and exam scores

Signed-off-by: yoyongxuan <66002397+yoyongxuan@users.noreply.github.com>

Add test case for valid examName but invalid
score for
toModelType_invalidExamScores_throwsIllegalValue
Exception
